text:
My name is Kheris Rogers,
I am 14 years old,

and I am from
Los Angeles, California.

When I was younger,
I was bullied
about my skin complexion.

I really wasn't confident
in myself at all.

But I had to learn
that I wasn't alone

in any situation
that I was going through.
That's what motivated me

to create
my own clothing line,
Flexin' In My Complexion,

to inspire everyone
across the world

to let them know that they are
beautiful no matter what.

You should never let
what someone says about you
get into your head.

What I say to myself
every morning

is that I am smart,
I am creative,

I am special,
and I am beautiful
just the way I am.

My biggest supporter
is my family,

especially my mom
and my sister.
They're the ones who taught me

the affirmations
that I say every morning
in front of the mirror.

When you see
someone being bullied,

you should always
use your voice.
Speak out what you feel

that is right
to speak out about.

You should actually
talk to the person

that you see is getting bullied
just to uplift them.
Believe in yourself,

that you can do anything
that you put your mind to.
My name is Kheris Rogers

and I use my voice
for anti-bullying.
Be creative. Let loose.
Use your voice.
